Description: Unique id representing a release, compiled_release or record
Position of the award in the awards array
Position of the document in the documents array
Either release, compiled_release, record, embedded_release. compiled_releases are releases generated by Kingfisher release compilation. embedded_releases are found in the releases array of a record.

id for the "data" table in Kingfisher that holds the original JSON data.
